name: Catalyst
description: Catalyst is an oscilloscope-themed robot that is part of the WebtrES club. With its classic box body and arms, and a screen resembling a cat, Catalyst brings a unique blend of functionality and charm. This robot is designed to analyze and interpret electrical signals with precision and accuracy. Its cat-themed screen adds a touch of playfulness to its serious work, making it a favorite among both engineers and cat lovers. Catalyst is always ready to assist in any electronic project and is a beloved member of the WebtrES community.
